attributes.action: Save Greenwich Borough Football Club From Closure By Greenwich Council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Greenwich Borough FC has been at it's site in Harrow Meadow for nearly 80 years now.It is a non-profit orginisation run purely by volunteers. The council want to sell the land to make money. The club caters for around 8 local teams as well as various youth teams. It also homes the Eltham Boxing Club And Eltham Warriors Club. With the club closing the local kids from around the area will be forced out onto the streets, which we know that no-one wants. We would like the government to intervene or to help re-loacte the club and its volunteers.
Please sign this petitiion for the local area, thanks

rejection.details: This is a local planning decision
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
